documentation.text: @dev Interface of the ILiquidStakingV2.
@dev get the SToken and UToken address
@dev returns the nearest epoch milestone in the future
@dev returns the time left for unbonding to finish

@dev Lock the unstaked tokens for 21 days, user can withdraw the same (Mint uTokens with 21 days locking period)
 Emits a {WithdrawUnstakeTokens} event.

@dev get Total Unbonded Tokens
 @param staker: account address

@dev get Total Unbonding Tokens
 @param staker: account address

SetBatchingLimit(uint256,uint256).details: Emitted when batching limit is set

SetFunctionPause(bool).details: Emitted when migration admin contract address is set

SetMigrationAdminContract(address).details: Emitted when migration admin contract address is set

SetMinimumValues(uint256,uint256).details: Emitted when minimum values are set

SetSTokensContract(address).details: Emitted when contract addresses are set

SetTokenWrapperContract(address).details: Emitted when contract addresses are set

SetUTokensContract(address).details: Emitted when contract addresses are set

SetUnstakingLockTime(uint256).details: Emitted when unstaking lock time is set

StakeDirect(address,uint256,uint256,uint.details: Emitted when batching limit is set

WithdrawUnstakeTokens(address,uint256,ui.details: Emitted when unstaked tokens are withdrawn

getStakeUnstakeProps().details: get fees, min values, value divisor and epoch props

getTokens().details: get the SToken and UToken address

getUnstakeEpochMilestone(uint256).details: returns the nearest epoch milestone in the future

getUnstakeTime(uint256).details: returns the time left for unbonding to finish

pause().details: Triggers stopped state. Requirements: - The contract must not be paused.

setBatchingLimit(uint256).details: Set 'batchingLimit', called from admin Emits a {SetBatchingLimit} event

params.unstakeFee: : unstake fee Emits a {SetFees} event with 'fee' set to the stake and unstake.

setFunctionPause(bool).details: Set 'function pause', called from pauser admin

params.ifPause: : if the functions are to be paused Emits a {SetFunctionPause} event with true/false

params.migrationAdminContract: : migration admin contract address Emits a {SetMigrationAdminContract} event with '_contract' set to the migration admin contract address.

params.minUnstake: : unstake minimum value Emits a {SetMinimumValues} event with 'minimum value' set to the stake and unstake.

setSTokensContract(address).details: Set STokens smart contract. Emits a {SetContract} event.

params.tokenWrapperContract: : stoken contract address Emits a {SetTokenWrapperContract} event with '_contract' set to the stoken contract address.

setUTokensContract(address).details: Set UTokens smart contract. Emits a {SetContract} event.

params.epochInterval: : varies from 3 hours to 3 days Emits a {SetUnstakeEpoch} event with 'unstakeEpoch'
params.unstakeEpochPrevious: : unstake epoch previous(initially set to same value as unstakeEpoch)

params.unstakingLockTime: : varies from 21 hours to 21 days Emits a {SetUnstakeProps} event with 'fee' set to the stake and unstake.

stake(address,uint256).details: Stake utokens over the platform with address 'to' for desired 'utok'(Burn uTokens and Mint sTokens) Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded. Emits a {StakeTokens} event.

stakeDirect(address,uint256,uint256).details: Stake utokens over the platform with address 'to' for desired 'amount'(Burn uTokens and Mint sTokens)

params.stakingAmount: : amount to be converted to stkToken
params.to: : user address for staking, amount: number of tokens to stake
params.wrappingAmount: : amount to be converted to pToken

stakeDirectInBatch(address[],uint256[],u.details: Stake utokens over the platform with address 'to' for desired 'amount'(Burn uTokens and Mint sTokens)

params.stakingAmounts: : amounts to be converted to stkToken
params.toAddressses: : user addresses for staking, amount: number of tokens to stake
params.wrappingAmounts: : amounts to be converted to pToken

unStake(address,uint256).details: UnStake stokens over the platform with address 'to' for desired 'stok' (Burn sTokens and Mint uTokens with 21 days locking period) Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded. Emits a {UnstakeTokens} event.

unpause().details: Returns to normal state. Requirements: - The contract must be paused.

withdrawUnstakedTokens(address).details: Lock the unstaked tokens for 21 days, user can withdraw the same (Mint uTokens with 21 days locking period) Emits a {WithdrawUnstakeTokens} event.
